articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Kangso Mineral Water Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Kangso Mineral Water Factory
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the Kangso Mineral Water Factory.
					 After being briefed on the factory before a map showing its panoramic view and a map for mineral water production, he went round the monument to the field guidance of the peerlessly great persons of Mt Paektu to the factory, the room for the education in revolutionary history and the room dedicated to its history.
					
					 He said that the factory was associated with the profound loving care of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for the people as the President personally chose the site of the factory and named the brand of "Kangso Mineral Water" and Kim Jong Il gave instruction for remodeling the factory in the period of the Arduous March and personally solved all problems arising in the project.
					
					 Looking around a combined control room, several production work-teams, production exhibition, water source ground, sci-tech learning space and other places, he learned in detail about the production and management of the factory.
					
					 To keep production going at a high rate at the factory serves as an important work for demonstrating the advantages of the socialist system of the DPRK which all wealth of the society is directed to promoting the wellbeing of the people, he said.
					
					 Noting that factory has a very important duty and role to play in protecting and promoting health of the people, he set forth tasks facing the factory.
					
					 He expressed the expectation and conviction that the officials and employees of the factory would mass-produce the famous Kangso mineral water good for people's health and send more mineral water to the people before having a photo session with them.
					
					 Accompanying him were An Jong Su, Kim Yong Su and Jo Yong Won, senior officials of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Congratulates Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Congratulates Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, Saturday sent a congratulatory message to Raul Castro Ruz, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba.
					 The message extended warm congratulations and comradely greetings to Raul Castro Ruz on his birthday and sincerely wished him good heath and greater success in his responsible work for the triumphant advance of the Cuban revolution.

articles.title: Vice-chairmen of C.C., WPK Visit Lodgings of Participants in 8th KCU Congress
articles.content:
Vice-chairmen of C.C., WPK Visit Lodgings of Participants in 8th KCU Congress
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Vice-chairmen of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea visited lodgings of the participants in the 8th Congress of the Korean Children's Union on Saturday.
					 Among them were Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Phyong Hae, Ri Man Gon and O Su Yong.
					
					 They warmly congratulated KCU members who have distinguished themselves in studying, organized life and good-conduct movement.
					
					 They called upon the participants to firmly prepare themselves as masters of the future who would shoulder the future Korea trusting and following only respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Participants in 8th KCU Congress Pay Homage to Great Leaders
articles.content:
Participants in 8th KCU Congress Pay Homage to Great Leaders
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 8th Congress of the Korean Children's Union Saturday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets at the statues and paid tribute to the great leaders.

articles.title: Stockholm Meeting on "Crisis Management on Korean Peninsula"
articles.content:
Stockholm Meeting on "Crisis Management on Korean Peninsula"
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- A multi-lateral workshop on "Crisis Management and Reduction of Tension on the Korean Peninsula" was held in Stockholm from May 31 to June 2, under the sponsorship of the Institute for Security and Development Policy of Sweden.
					 Taking part in it were a delegation of the Disarmament and Peace Institute of the DPRK Foreign Ministry and delegations of political research institutes of Sweden, China, the U.S., Japan and south Korea.
					
					 The workshop had an in-depth discussion on how to defuse the tension and ensure peace and security on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: School Youth Start Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Mt Paektu Area
articles.content:
School Youth Start Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Mt Paektu Area
 Hyesan, June 3 (KCNA) -- School youth across the country set out on the study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt Paektu on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the victorious battle of Pochonbo commanded by President Kim Il Sung.
					 They had a kick-off meeting in front of the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Hyesan City on Saturday.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and flowers before the statues and paid homage to the great leaders.
					
					 At the meeting, its reporter and other speakers stressed the need for the school youth to deeply grasp the feats of Kim Il Sung, who instilled into all Koreans hope for national restoration and aroused them to the sacred war for national liberation through the victory in the battle of Pochonbo, and get fully ready to become brave warriors for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche by enshrining the revolutionary spirit of Paektu, the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu.
					
					 After the meeting, the members of the study tour group began their march towards Pochonbo.

articles.title: Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
articles.content:
Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site Draws Endless Stream of Visitors
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Visitors to the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site are now on the steady increase with the approach of the 80th anniversary of the victorious battle of Pochonbo commanded by President Kim Il Sung.
					 The battle site has been visited by millions of people including service personnel and school youth and children for the last 10 years.
					
					 The site is a major center for education in the revolutionary traditions as it shows the revolutionary feats the President performed in the anti-Japanese armed struggle by setting forth the policy for advance into the homeland and guiding the Pochonbo battle to victory.
					
					 The visitors presented floral baskets and bouquets to the statue of the President imposingly standing there in the uniform dating back to the anti-Japanese war.
					
					 Going round the command post of the Battle of Pochonbo, the police sub-station and other battle places, they grasped the brilliant military strategy and tactics of the President, legendary hero of the anti-Japanese war, and the historic significance of the Pochonbo battle.

articles.title: New Stamp Issued
articles.content:
New Stamp Issued
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The DPRK issued a new stamp (one sheet) in commemoration of the 80th anniversary of the victorious battle of Pochonbo.
					 Seen in the sheet depicting the red flag is image of President Kim Il Sung who led the Pochonbo battle to victory.
					
					 Reflected in the stamp are flames of Pochonbo and appearance of anti-Japanese guerillas advancing into the stronghold of enemy.
					
					 Printed in its upper part are letters reading "80th anniversary of victorious Pochonbo battle" and "Juche 26 (1937)-Juche 106 (2017)".

articles.title: Undying Flames of Pochonbo
articles.content:
Undying Flames of Pochonbo
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- It has been 80 years since the victory in the battle of Pochonbo commanded by President Kim Il Sung in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 At 10 p.m. of June 4, Juche 26 (1937), the main force of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) assaulted the enemy's administrative centers like police substation, sub-county office, post office, forest conservation office and fire hall in Pochonbo at a signal of a gunshot fired by the President. All the enemy's administrative organs were in flames, which resembled a gigantic torch.
					
					 The flames of Pochonbo, which instilled into the Korean people the hope for national restoration, were a manifestation of the national spirit that no enemy can avoid its ruin if it dared provoke Korea, a revelation of national dignity that no one can enslave the Korean nation and a declaration of the President's strong will that the victory is sure to come when the Korean nation is firmly united against the enemy.
					
					 This great truth has been steadily proved along with the development of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The Korean people accomplished the cause of national liberation by defeating the Japanese imperialists in 1945 and defeated the armed invasion upon the young DPRK made by the U.S. imperialists in the 1950s.
					
					 They inflicted shameful defeats upon the U.S. imperialists whenever the latter had made provocations like the Pueblo incident, Panmunjom incident and large spy plane EC-121 incident against the DPRK. And they emerged victorious in the nuclear confrontation with the U.S. imperialists in the 1990s.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il had crushed the imperialists' moves against socialism with his matchless courage and grit that encounter the enemy's dagger with sword and enemy's rifle with gun.
					
					 Now, the spirit of the DPRK is being fully demonstrated all over the world thanks to the Songun leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is reliably carrying forward the revolutionary cause of the great leaders.
					
					 Last year alone, the respected supreme leader wisely led the first H-bomb test, a series of test-fires of various striking means and the explosion test of nuclear warhead to a success, thus bolstering up the nuclear force at a high speed.
					
					 And the DPRK emerged as a nuclear power in the East, a leading rocket power in Asia through continuous successful test-fires of strategic weapons this year.
					
					 Indeed, the flames of Pochonbo rise higher in the DPRK, demonstrating the strong determination of the Songun brilliant commander that never pardons anyone who dares hurt the dignity of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Victorious Battle of Pochonbo
articles.content:
Victorious Battle of Pochonbo
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and civilians of the DPRK are significantly greeting the 80th anniversary of the victory in the historic battle of Pochonbo in this stirring period that an all-out general offensive for building a powerful socialist country is being carried out, demonstrating all over the world the invincibility of the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt. Paektu, under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The battle, commanded by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle, was an event of great significance which gave a telling blow to the Japanese invaders, instilled into the Korean people the hope for national restoration that Korea was not dead but alive and the conviction that it could be liberated with the might of national independence without fail and thus aroused all the Korean people to the anti-Japanese struggle.
					
					 After the battle, the anti-Japanese national liberation movement entered a period of fresh upsurge centered on the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Under the guidance of the President, the theatre of the anti-Japanese armed struggle were rapidly extended to the homeland with 26 secret bases and 60-odd temporary secret bases built and over 120 armed resistance organizations formed across the country, which enabled the accomplishment of historic cause of national liberation with the powerful internal forces.
					
					 Though 80 years have passed since the battle, the flames kindled by the President in Pochonbo serve as an eternal banner for the victory in the Korean revolution which encourages all the army and people of the DPRK in their grand advance to accomplish the socialist cause of Juche.

articles.title: Victorious Battle Admired by World
articles.content:
Victorious Battle Admired by World
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- June 4 this year is the 80th anniversary of the victorious battle of Pochonbo commanded by President Kim Il Sung in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 The battle was a triumphant event in that dealt a telling blow at the Japanese imperialists who had been strutting around Korea and Manchuria as if they were the lords of Asia. It also marked a decisive turning point in liberating the conquered nation and bringing about the revival of the nation, evoking great responses among the Korean people and other peoples of the world.
					
					 After the battle, such rumors as "Japs were destroyed in Pochonbo" and "General Kim Il Sung is a great commander mowing down the Japanese army in Mt. Paektu, riding a heaven-sent swift steed" were spread among Koreans.
					
					 Greatly excited by the news about the battle, Ryo Un Hyong, a well-known figure in the national independent movement, hurried to the battle site. He said that he felt his distress as a citizen of a ruined nation disappeared into thin air in an instant, walking around Pochonbo. And he added that the thought that Tangun's Korea was alive moved him to tears.
					
					 Kim Ku, one of leading members of the Provisional Government in Shanghai, was so inflamed by the news and opened the windows and shouted over and over again that the Paedal nation was alive.
					
					 Dong-A Ilbo, Joson Ilbo, Kyongsong Ilbo and other major newspapers in the homeland all reported the news of the battle. The battle was also headlined by the Japanese mass media, such as Tokyo Nichinichi Shimbun, and Osaka Asahi Shimbun, and Chinese newspapers, including Manchurian Daily, Manchurian News and Taiwan Daily. Pravda and Krasnoye Znamya, not to mention TASS, of the Soviet Union also gave liberal space to this battle.
					
					 Even the then police sergeant of the South Hamgyong provincial police department under the Japanese imperialists' government-general in Korea confessed that the battle was an event that gave a deadly blow to the Empire of Japan which was seized with the wild ambition for aggression on the continent, advocating that "Korea and Japan are one" and that "Japanese and Koreans are of the same descent."
					
					 The then chief of the Hyesan police station, too, said in an article carried by magazine Hamnamgyongu that he felt as if he had been struck hard on the back of the head and he felt the shame of watching the haystack he had been carefully building for a thousand days go up in flames in an instant.
					
					 Indeed, the battle of Pochonbo was a historic event of great significance which dealt a telling blow to the Japanese imperialists and instilled into the Korean people and the world progressives the confidence in victory.

articles.title: No One Is Entitled to Find Fault with DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
No One Is Entitled to Find Fault with DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- There are recently many claims in the international arena terming the U.S. and its vassal forces' anti-DPRK sanctions unjust.
					 Pablo Jofre Leal, a Chilean journalist, writer and analyst who is a professor on international relations at the Universidad Complutense de Madrid, in a commentary posted on a website said that those who were scathingly faulting the missile test-fire of the DPRK, specifically the United Nations and the EU, are keeping mum about the U.S. missile test-launch and deployment of THAAD in south Korea.
					
					 The commentary went on:
					
					 Then, the question arises as to whether the majority of world media and the international community should overlook this double-standard and two-faced act or not.
					
					 Now the world has turned into the one where hypocrisy, lies and frauds prevail, only to offer more authority to a few countries including the U.S.
					
					 What is important above all to achieve detente on the Korean peninsula is to get rid of such prejudiced, double-standard and unfair viewpoint and deed that the U.S. and some other countries are allowed to conduct nuclear tests and missile test-launches but such country as the DPRK should become a target of international sanctions and blockade.
					
					 In the international relations a fair order should be established to reject big-power chauvinist and short-sighted behavior based on national egoism, oppose acts of aggression, respect cooperation and the right to self-determination and put an end to hegemony.
					
					 A former official of the U.S. Department of State asserted in an interview on May 19 that the Trump administration, which set "maximum pressure and engagement" as its new DPRK policy, should necessarily drop the conception of exceedingly sticking to sanctions.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The U.S. is accustomed to selecting sanctions as its easiest countermeasure for dealing with the nuclear issue of north Korea but such sanctions don't work on it.
					
					 It is important for it to remind itself of the lesson that its export embargo on Japan in 1941 pushed Japan to attack its base in the Pearl Harbor.
					
					 Now is the time for the U.S. and other relevant countries to get their breath back, lower the degree of sanctions and get themselves ready to opt for engagement with north Korea. 
					
					 A Russian military expert Vladimir Khrustalyov, asserting that every one is seeking to "gloss over", failing to urge nuclear-armed Pakistan and India to dismantle the nukes, said the DPRK would not sincerely accept the demand for dismantlement of its nukes in that atmosphere.
					
					 As seen above, the U.S. absurdly paints a black picture of the just steps taken by the DPRK to defend its sovereignty, running amuck to stamp it out with all false accusations, but connives at its allies' threat-representative deeds.
					
					 Typically, Israel could succeed in developing nukes in 1969 with the exclusive backing of the U.S. The U.S. also secretly sold 1,500 equipment for producing nukes to Israel in the 1980s. And in the 1990s it promised to help Israel tackle the international pressure on its nuclear weaponization.
					
					 Such an ill logic that the U.S. and its allies' missile launches are "conducive" to preserving peace and security but the DPRK's missile test-fire is a "provocation" that escalates tensions doesn't make sense.
					
					 No one is entitled to find fault with the DPRK's exercise of just rights to self-defence to protect the sovereignty and vital rights.

articles.title: U.S. Must Stop Modernization of Nuclear Strategic Assets: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. Must Stop Modernization of Nuclear Strategic Assets: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Much upset by the DPRK's military capabilities making rapid progress, the U.S. is spurring the modernization of its nuclear strategic assets calling for countering "emergency" on the Korean peninsula.
					 The combat system of Nimitz-class nuclear carriers including Abraham Lincoln is undergoing renovation for mounting F-35C for a preemptive strike at strategic targets of the DPRK. Washington is also mulling increasing the attack capabilities through the drill of dropping GBU-12.
					
					 The U.S. is blustering that it would increase the number of the launching tubes of Virginia-class nuclear subs to 40 from 12 to treble their ground attack capabilities and that it would maximize the combat capabilities of Stealth destroyer Zumwalt in a short period for its deployment in the waters off south Korea.
					
					 It gets vociferous, saying that the "improvement of attack capabilities of strategic assets would bring more effective military pressure on the north" and "they would display great might in attacking the coastal areas of the north in case of emergency".
					
					 This proves that the U.S. remains unchanged in its sordid intention to stifle the DPRK by force, hold a military edge in Asia-Pacific and thus realize without fail its ambition for world domination, and that it is none other than the U.S. which is rendering the situation on the peninsula and the region extremely tense.
					
					 Through the long history of DPRK-U.S. stand-off we are well aware of the crafty nature of the U.S. which always watches for a chance for launching invasion while spurring the preparations for it behind its peace propaganda.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons was the best strategic option for defending the destiny and sovereignty of the country and preserving peace of the region in the face of the U.S. hideous hostile policy toward the DPRK and its nuclear threat and blackmail that has lasted decade after decade.
					
					 Its most powerful nuclear deterrence provided a powerful guarantee for putting an eternal end to the danger of outsiders' aggression and war and ensuring the bright future of the nation.
					
					 The DPRK, a peace-loving socialist country, values and loves peace more than others but is neither afraid of nor is going to evade it.
					
					 What is at issue is that the U.S. high-ranking authorities have become frantic in their arms buildup, while letting out a spate of rhetoric that "it would neither seek a regime change in the north nor invade it but would ensure its system" and "war with the north would bring disaster".
					
					 The DPRK will neither loosen its vigilance nor lay down its arms, being taken in by a few rhetoric of the U.S. Its army and people will not make a concession in bolstering the nuclear deterrence for self-defence, the critical option, being taken in by the crafty trick of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. bluffing targeting weak countries without nuclear weapons will not work on the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is escalating the useless military stand-off, failing to face up to the situation. This would only result in making the sword targeting the U.S. more sharp.
					
					 The DPRK's decisive drive for implementing the self-reliant defence policy to produce more Korean-style Juche weapons, absolute weapons for striking terror into the enemies, will continue without letup even a moment until the U.S. imperialists are brought to their final ruin and their vassal forces are completely wiped out.
					
					 The international community is closely following the U.S. reckless moves for modernizing nuclear strategic assets for "contingency" on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: S. Koreans Protest against THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
S. Koreans Protest against THAAD Deployment
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification and other civic and social groups of south Korea reportedly gathered outside the Defense Ministry building to hold a press conference on Wednesday.
					 At the conference they criticized the military authorities for hiding the additional introduction of four launchers of THAAD.
					
					 Speakers at the conference termed THAAD a good-for-nothing weapon harassing peace and security.
					
					 Accusing the Defense Ministry of deceiving the public and illegally introducing THAAD, they urged the "government" to thoroughly review the whole course of its deployment, punish the mastermind and retract the deployment project at once.

articles.title: Investigation into THAAD Deployment Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Investigation into THAAD Deployment Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Action for Checking THAAD Deployment on May 31 demanded a strict investigation into the process of THAAD deployment, punishment of chief culprit and immediate stop to the deployment and withdrawal of THAAD, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 It is the neglect of duty and heavy crime that the Defense Ministry intentionally hid the fact about the additional introduction of four launching pads of THAAD, the organization said.
					
					 Saying the deployment of THAAD is the crime of treachery, the body stressed the need to prove the truth about decision on the deployment and the process of introduction and punish those chiefly responsible for the case.

articles.title: Nullification "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Nullification "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Pusan Federation of Women's Organizations and the Pusan Women's Action for Solution of the Issue of Sexual Slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in south Korea held a Wednesday rally in Pusan on May 31.
					 Speakers at the rally called for proper settlement of the issue of sexual slavery for the imperial Japanese army.
					
					 Then the participants held a press conference in front of a girl's statue in Pusan.
					
					 In a statement they demanded that the "agreement" on the sexual slavery issue, made without any sincere apology from the Japanese government, should be totally nullified and retracted. They also urged the Japanese government to admit the past crime related to the issue and make an official apology and legal reparation and the south Korean authorities to take a positive step for proper solution to the issue.

articles.title: Judgment on KCTU Chairman Slammed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Judgment on KCTU Chairman Slammed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea on May 31 issued a commentary in protest against the judgment of the puppet court which sentenced Han Sang Gyun, chairman of the Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) to three years in prison on charges of organizing an illegal meeting.
					 The commentary denounced the Judicature for abusing the basic principle of democracy.

articles.title: DPRK Is Fortress Firmly Guaranteeing Global Peace: Italians
articles.content:
DPRK Is Fortress Firmly Guaranteeing Global Peace: Italians
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- The Italy-DPRK Association for Friendship and Solidarity and the Italian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on May 25 in support of the just cause of the Korean people.
					 Expressing solidarity with the Korean people in the vigorous struggle against the evermore escalated U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, the statement said:
					
					 The imperialists have tried hard to keep Songun Korea from having military strength able to frustrate their war moves.
					
					 However, the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army is ready to counter with any form of war by the enemies.
					
					 The recent successful test-fires of new-type ground-to-ground medium-to-long range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-12 and ground-to-ground medium-to-long range strategic ballistic missile Pukguksong-2 are great victories won by the Korean people closely rallied around the Workers' Party Korea under the wise guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We are convinced that the DPRK will achieve shining victory in the showdown with the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK is a fortress reliably guaranteeing the global peace and an invincible socialist bulwark.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 3 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Hungary and Austria and lecture meetings in Angola between May 26 and 29 to mark the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The chairman of the Workers' Party of Hungary said at a seminar:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il is the peerlessly elder statesman and eternal leader of the WPK as he reliably defended Korean-style socialism in the grim period when the imperialists were getting evermore pronounced in the anti-socialist moves.
					
					 His desire for building a socialist power is being successfully translated into reality by respected Comrade Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chief and members of the Youth Group for Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Formed in Austria praised the feats of Kim Jong Il who had developed the WPK into the organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people and true mother party since he started his work at its Central Committee.
					
					 Speakers at lecture meetings in Angola said that they were deeply impressed to see the DPRK invariably advancing along the road of Songun under the leadership of Kim Jong Un who inherited the courage and pluck of Kim Jong Il. And they stressed that the Korean people's just cause would surely emerge victorious under his guidance.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita la Fabrica de Aguas Minerales de Kangso
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita la Fabrica de Aguas Minerales de Kangso
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un realizo una visita de orientacion sobre la Fabrica de Aguas Minerales de Kangso.
					Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el plano de la fabrica y el de los procesos de produccion, el vio el monumento a las visitas de orientacion de los grandes hombres sin iguales del monte Paektu y paso revista a la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la otra de presentacion del historial.
					
					Dijo que esta fabrica deja conocer el inmenso amor por el pueblo del Presidente Kim Il Sung, quien fijo personalmente el solar de la fabrica y denomino sus productos como "aguas minerales de Kangso", y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien en el dificil periodo de la Marcha Penosa, dio la indicacion de remodelarla modernamente y soluciono todos los problemas surgidos en esta obra.
					
					En su recorrido por la sala de control general, varios equipos de produccion, la exhibicion de muestras, el deposito de aguas de fuente, la sala de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas y otros puntos, se cercioro de la situacion de produccion y de las actividades administrativas.
					
					Normalizar en alto nivel la produccion de la fabrica constituye un trabajo muy importante para demostrar la superioridad del regimen socialista de nuestro pais donde todas las propiedades sociales se usan para el fomento del bienestar del pueblo, apunto.
					
					Presento las tareas que incumben a la fabrica diciendo que ella tiene la mision y papel muy importantes en proteger y fomentar la salud publica.
					
					Se fotografio con los funcionarios y empleados exponiendo la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos produciran en gran cantidad las famosas aguas minerales de Kangso que son buenas para la salud del hombre y las enviaran mucho mas a los habitantes.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion los cuadros directivos del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, An Jong Su, Kim Yong Su y Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita cumpleanos de Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita cumpleanos de Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, remitio hoy un mensaje de felicitacion al Primer Secretario del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Cuba, Raul Castro Ruz. 
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Reciba mis cordiales felicitaciones y saludo camaraderil que le envio en ocasion de su cumpleanos. 
					
					Deseo de todo corazon que Vd. se mantenga en buen estado de salud en el futuro tambien y alcance mayores exitos en sus responsabilidades por el avance victorioso de la Revolucion Cubana.

articles.title: Cuadros visitan alojamiento de participantes en VIII Congreso de ONC
articles.content:
Cuadros visitan alojamiento de participantes en VIII Congreso de ONC
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ACNC) -- Los vicepresidentes del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Phyong Hae, Ri Man Gon y O Su Yong y otros cuadros directivos del CC del PTC y de las instituciones de fuerzas armadas y la Union de la Juventud Kimilsungista-Kimjongilista visitaron el dia 3 el alojamiento de los participantes en el VIII Congreso de la Organizacion de Ninos de Corea.
					Los visitantes felicitaron a los integrantes de la ONC que se destacaron en el estudio, la militancia en la organizacion y el movimiento de trabajos utiles.
					
					Les encomendaron que sigan solamente al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un y crezcan como protagonistas del futuro de Corea.

articles.title: Tiene lugar en Suecia reunion multilateral sobre la crisis de Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
Tiene lugar en Suecia reunion multilateral sobre la crisis de Peninsula Coreana
Pyongyang, 3 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del 31 de mayo al 2 de junio en Estocolmo, Suecia, la reunion multilateral sobre el manejo de crisis y la reduccion de tension en la Peninsula Coreana bajo auspicios del Instituto de la Politica de Seguridad y Desarrollo de Suecia.
					Asistieron a la ocasion la delegacion del Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y las otras de los organos de estudio de la politica de Suecia, China, Estados Unidos, Japon y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Los reunidos discutieron con seriedad los remedios para relajar la tension y garantizar la paz y seguridad en la Peninsula Coreana.
